purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of

inscope.li: identification of a parameter for a model;
the assignment of values to a model parameter;
the assignment of a parameter to a model;
the overriding of a parameter assignment;
the assignment of a parameter value to a product;

aa.refpath: model_parameter <= descriptive_representation_item <= representation_item <- representation.items[i] representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 representation_relationship {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = `default value'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item group_assigned_item = representation_item group_assigned_item <- applied_group_assignment.items[i] applied_group_assignment <= group_assignment group_assignment.assigned_group -> group => characteristic_type}

model_parameter <= descriptive_representation_item <= representation_item <- representation.items[i] representation <- representation_relationship.rep_2 representation_relationship {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = `default value'} representation_relationship.rep_1 -> representation => coordinated_representation_item

model_parameter <= descriptive_representation_item <= representation_item <- representation.items[i] representation <- representation_relationship.rep_2 representation_relationship {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = `valid range'} representation_relationship.rep_1 -> representation representation.items[i] -> representation_item => coordinated_representation_item

model_parameter <= descriptive_representation_item <= representation_item document_reference_item = representation_item document_reference_item <- applied_document_reference.items[i] applied_document_reference <= document_reference document_reference.assigned_document -> (document) (document => ee_specification)

parameter_assignment_representation <= representation representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item group_assigned_item = representation_item group_assigned_item <- applied_group_assignment.items[i] applied_group_assignment <= group_assignment group_assignment.assigned_group -> group => characteristic_type}
parameter_assignment_representation <= representation representation.items[i] -> representation_item => descriptive_representation_item => model_parameter

schema_based_model_parameter <= model_parameter <= representation_item <- representation.items[i] representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 representation_relationship {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = `attribute name'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = `attribute name'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item descriptive_representation_item.description

schema_based_model_parameter <= model_parameter <= representation_item <- representation.items[i] representation <- representation_relationship.rep_1 representation_relationship {representation_relationship representation_relationship.name = `entity name'} representation_relationship.rep_2 -> representation representation.items[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = `entity name'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item descriptive_representation_item.description
